title: Zakir Quresh - Director, SMB Properties | Luxury Real Estate Developer (Kenya & East Africa)
description: Profile of Zakir Quresh, Director of SMB Properties. A visionary in Kenyan luxury real estate, known for Le Mirage Residences, SMB Suites, and pioneering "vertical cities" in Nairobi and Mombasa.
ogTitle: Zakir Quresh | Visionary Developer & MD - SMB Properties Kenya
ogDescription: Meet Zakir Quresh, the leader behind SMB Properties. Explore his work in defining luxury living in East Africa through branded residences like Le Mirage and award-winning high-rises.

@graph.name: Zakir Quresh - Luxury Real Estate Developer
@graph.description: Profile of Zakir Quresh, Director of SMB Properties, transforming Kenya's skyline with luxury branded residences and high-end hospitality projects.

@graph.name: Zakir Quresh
@graph.description: Zakir Quresh is the Director and Managing Director of SMB Properties, a leading Kenyan real estate firm. He is known for iconic projects like Le Mirage Residences and SMB Suites.
@graph.award: Best Luxury Residential Development (Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2021)
